name: In Case of Emergency
description:
You are on a ship. That is sinking. Everyone is panicking. But you have a way of calming them down!

Play your violin in the colour shown over their heads by moving your controller stick. It might not be beautiful, but it works!

Must use controller. Xbox supported.

We made this game at a jam called Norwegian Gameplay Championship, early in January 2017. The theme was fear. It is short and free and we hope you have fun!
